code: export const setWithExpiry=(key,value,expirationMinutes)=>{const now=new Date();const item={value:value,expiry:now.getTime()+expirationMinutes*60*1000};localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(item));};export const getWithExpiry=key=>{const itemStr=localStorage.getItem(key);if(!itemStr){return null;}const item=JSON.parse(itemStr);const now=new Date();if(now.getTime()>item.expiry){localStorage.removeItem(key);return null;}return item.value;};
